1: All you nations, clap your hands. Shout out to God in celebration.[b]
2: For the Lord Most High[c] is awe-inspiring;[d] he is the great king who rules the whole earth![e]
3: He subdued nations beneath us[f] and countries[g] under our feet.
4: He picked out for us a special land[h] to be a source of pride for[i] Jacob,[j] whom he loves.[k] (Selah)
5: God has ascended his throne[l] amid loud shouts;[m] the Lord has ascended amid the blaring of ram's horns.[n]
6: Sing to God! Sing! Sing to our king! Sing!
7: For God is king of the whole earth. Sing a well-written song.[o]
8: God reigns[p] over the nations. God sits on his holy throne.
9: The nobles of the nations assemble, along with the people of the God of Abraham,[q] for God has authority over the rulers[r] of the earth. He is highly exalted.[s]
